txt.en: In your absence, new threats have come to Evendim. Brangil, a Ranger in Tinnudir, seeks the assistance of a brave hero as he works to stop the advancement of the enemy upon Annúminas.
Brangil can be found in Tinnudir.\n\nYou should speak with Brangil.

'Hail [placeholder], what brings you to Evendim this day? There is danger out there my friend.

'Calenglad has tasked me with scouting the lands for new threats. He has heard my latest report and now I will share what I have seen with you if you are willing to listen.

'The enemy has taken a renewed interest in Annúminas. Strong enemies now roam the hills and lakeside looking for hidden artifacts and treasures. We could use your assistance in dealing with these threats.'
Brangil can be found in Tinnudir.\n\nYou should speak with Brangil.
Brangil requires assistance as Evendim faces a renewed threat.
